control_plane.ansible_host: provide your server's ip address or dns name
control_plane.ansible_ssh_private_key_file: provide the path to your ssh private key file

worker1.ansible_host: provide your server's ip address or dns name
worker1.ansible_ssh_private_key_file: provide the path to your ssh private key file

nya.control_plane.vars.registry_host: provide your control_plane's ip at port 5000
nya.control_plane.vars.secret_name: provide a secret name to use for your tls certs

nya.control_plane.vars.mkcert_arch: provide the cpu architecture you're building for (i.e. arm64, x86)

nya.nodes.vars.registry_host: provide your control_plane's ip at port 5000
nya.nodes.vars.control_plane_ip: provide your control plane's ip address
